# STREAMING::SET_ISLAND_ENABLED

## Parameters
* **STRING** islandName
* **BOOL** enabled

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Enables the specified island. For more information, see islandhopper.meta
